TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted.

 

I wish for that

Graned. You have a multi-pipe vuvuzela.

I wish for RD-0411.

1 hour ago, kerbiloid said:

Graned. You have a multi-pipe vuvuzela.

I wish for RD-0411.

THAT'S A NUCLEAR THERMAL ENGINE! 

Granted. You are under arrest because you buy critical items from a disputed country. 

I wish for NERVA.

NERVA is an equivalent of RD-0411, and I'm in the RD-0411 country.

So, granted and wished vice versa.

Granted!

Your NERV never arrived as it was cancelled before it was finished!

I wish for KSP 2 to have no bugs.

Granted. It hardly has Kerbals, let alone the insects...
... or do you mean the sound of invisible crickets?

I wish for the KSP-1 revival.

Granted: But you realise it never died.

I wish to see the most beautifully modded KSP 1 there is.
I wish to join this wish and have it granted.

Granted.

 

I wish to have a multistage crewed heavy rocket (such as the SLS) but with moar boosters

Granted. It will launch in like 500 years.

I wish the default spacecraft name in KSP2 was Untitled Space Craft

Just now, Admiral Fluffy said:

Granted. It will launch in like 500 years.

I wish the default spacecraft name in KSP2 was Untitled Space Craft

Granted, but the game is so buggy, that every craft in KSP2 is now permanently "Untitled Space Craft", and it spreads to KSP1 somehow

 

I wish the default spacecraft name in KSP2 could be changed in the settings.

Granted. However, it the settings menu, there are only two additional names that can be selected aside from the default name. Those are called "Default 2" and "Default 3".

I wish never hallucinate again after waking from a nightmare.

Granted. You don't.... wake. You realize that you are sleeping now, and waking up there.

I wish to know the history of my city central area in details.

Granted, you know where each bit of rebar is in your city center, their EXACT coordinates and you forget all else.

i wish ksp2 was optimized and as playable as ksp1

230802282023

Edited March 1, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted. They focus on optimizing KSP2, so no new contents. 

I wish for Lol-o-tron 9001

Granted. The Lol-o-tron 9001 is yours, free!, for Ninety-nine, Ninety-nine, Nine-tee-Nine!

I wish Mike the TV was real.

2 minutes ago, Exploro said:

Granted. The Lol-o-tron 9001 is yours, free!, for Ninety-nine, Ninety-nine, Nine-tee-Nine!

I wish Mike the TV was real.

Granted, he is real and his distance 3956 miles and rapidly closing. run.

 

I wish these reactors didnt explode at 10k timewarp COME ON THIS STAGE GONNA BURN FOR THIRTY DAYS

Granted, but it can only work above 10k timewarp

i wish for a wish that is airtight, assembled by a team of lawyers, with 40 pages of terms and conditions to ensure no corruption.

Granted. But to access your wish you must yield acceptance of your wish to the kraken and pay a fee of 1,000$ to the lawyer.

i wish i had a had that had had a had that was a had that had the had.

192103022023

Granted, your house is flooded with the word "had" somehow

 

 

I wish for all doors in KSP to get yeeted into Grian's vault for maximum confusion

Granted. KSP and Minecraft get merged, so now not the rockets blast Kerbals, but the Kreepers blast rockets.

I wish to find out the most complete and balanced combination of Minetest mods.

13 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. KSP and Minecraft get merged, so now not the rockets blast Kerbals, but the Kreepers blast rockets.

I wish to find out the most complete and balanced combination of Minetest mods.

Granted, but it only results in every single cubic nanometer of your minecraft world being stuffed with a few trillion pieces of toast

I wish for a minecraft-ksp hybrid

Granted. I made a KSPCraft mod, but it only works on Infdev versions. 

I wish for an auto-save mod. (my minmus mining vessel disappeared because I forgot to F5.)

Granted. The mod automatically saves your RAM by deleting the crafts.

I wish for the /noclip mode irl.

2 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. The mod automatically saves your RAM by deleting the crafts.

I wish for the /noclip mode irl.

Granted, but you forgot the /nogravity mode and fall through the planet

 

I wish for something funny to happen
